column4: Hi folks, is it possiblke to share the same /home between Ibex and Netbook version of ubuntu ?
yes if u have a separate partition for /home
and if u don't have a separate partition then you can simply link everything in the home directory to the other distro's home directory
I d'like to ues one and the same /home partition for both systems ...
then set the mount path of the partition to /home in all sys
